name: Anvilwrought Raptor
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
